Class Date

java.lang.Object
Environment.Date
public class Date extends Object
This class is meant to store dates to be used to describe Observations made
Version:
1.0.0

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Date(int d, int m, int y)
    Creates a Date using the given date, month, and year ints

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date(int d, int m, int y)
      Creates a Date using the given date, month, and year ints
      Parameters:
      d - The day of the Date
      m - The month of the Date
      y - The year of the Date

  • Method Details

    • isIllegalDate

      public boolean isIllegalDate()
      Checks whether the Date is a real date on the calendar
      Returns:
      Returns true if the Date is not a real date, false if it is a real date

    • isALeapYear

      public boolean isALeapYear()
      Checks whether this date falls on a leap year
      Returns:
      Returns true if the Date is a leap year, false if it is not

    • getDay

      public int getDay()
      Returns day
      Returns:
      Returns the Date's day

    • getMonth

      public int getMonth()
      Returns month
      Returns:
      Returns Date's month

    • getYear

      public int getYear()
      Returns year
      Returns:
      Returns Date's year

    • getWeekDay

      public String getWeekDay()
      Returns the day of the week that the Date falls on
      Returns:
      Returns a String representing the Date's day of the week

    • getMonthString

      public String getMonthString()
      Returns the month that the Date is in
      Returns:
      Returns a String representing the Date's month of the year

    • getDayString

      public String getDayString()
      Returns the name of the day the Date falls on
      Returns:
      Returns a String representing the name of the Date's day

    • dayOfWeekInt

      public int dayOfWeekInt()
      Returns the day of the week that the Date falls on
      Returns:
      Returns an int value representing the Date's day of the week. 0 is Sunday, 6 is Saturday

    • maxDays

      public int maxDays()
      Returns the maximum number of days that the Date's month can have
      Returns:
      Returns an int representing the maximum number of days in the Date's month

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the Date as a String
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Returns the Date as a String in the form of "Weekday Month day, year"

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date o)
      Compare's this Date's values to another dates values in chronological order
      Parameters:
      o - The other Date to be compared
      Returns:
      Returns an int representing whether this has a sooner, later, or the same date as the other Date

    • randDate

      public static Date randDate()
      Returns a random Date
      Returns:
      Returns a new randomly generated valid Date object
